original_title: Once Upon a Time in Amritsar
overview: Once Upon a Time in Amritsar is an upcoming punjabi action drama film,directed By Harjit Singh Ricky,The star cast of the Film Dilpreet Dhillon, Gurjind Maan, Farida Jalaal, Pavan Malhotra, B.N. Sharma, Shivendra Mahal, Asish Duggal, Prince Kanwaljit Singh, Sonia Kaur, Vishakha Thakur

title: Once Upon a Time in Amritsar
